definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">No additional trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="compare_mcitems"><value name="a"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:OrbOfLightning</field></block></value><value name="b"><block type="entity_iteminoffhand"/></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="strike_lightning"><value name="x"><block type="entity_lookpos_x"><value name="maxdistance"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">100</field></block></value></block></value><value name="y"><block type="entity_lookpos_y"><value name="maxdistance"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">100</field></block></value></block></value><value name="z"><block type="entity_lookpos_z"><value name="maxdistance"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">100</field></block></value></block></value></block></statement><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="compare_mcitems"><value name="a"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:OrbOfFire</field></block></value><value name="b"><block type="entity_iteminoffhand"/></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="world_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">zatial nefunguje(fire)</field></block></value></block></statement><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="compare_mcitems"><value name="a"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:OrbOfGround</field></block></value><value name="b"><block type="entity_iteminoffhand"/></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="world_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">zatial nefunguje(ground)</field></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
